name: Cyanic City
description:
The heroes of Cyanic City have all lost their way! You need to find them, and convince them to come back, team up, and save the city!

This game was made at Azusa Pacific University for the Global Game Jam 2021 by:

Amaya Salazar (Art and Character Design)
Dawson Mix (Developer)
Isaac Diaz (Writer and Ideation)
Jacob Newlin (Writer and Assets)
Christian Peterson (Proofing and Continuity)
